attacks.name: Warm Up
attacks.effect: If you have any benched Pokémon, search your deck for a Energy card and attach it to 1 of them. Then shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Burning Flame
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard a Energy card attached to Light Flareon or this attack does nothing. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 damage for each heads.
